 2019-06402019-06-02,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of MAUREEN KEMPSTON DARKES, O.C., O.Ont., of Toronto, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to serve as a member of the Interim Management Advisory Board for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a part-time basis.
